task.title: View Query History
task.shortdesc: View the query history for a project.

step.cmd: Select the Query Query History... menu item.
step.stepresult: The Query History window will appear, with a list of your saved queries on the left.To arrange the listed queries by Date, Name, or # of Result Sets, click on the appropriate column header. To further change column view options, click on the icon to the right of the column headers.

step.cmd: Select a query from the list to view its Info and Results.
step.stepresult: From here, you will have options to open the selected query, view result sets, or generate a report.

step.cmd: Double-click a result set to open it.
step.stepresult: By default, this will open a Results window alongside the session in which those results were found. When the session is closed, the Results window will close too. To open only the Results window, deselect Open session with result set.To list only result sets which contain results, select Hide empty result sets.

step.cmd: To open the selected query for further editing, click Open Query, and edit and run your query as desired. To generate a report, click Report.
